Our Mission

What is Job Club?

A comprehensive community that bridges education, industry, and innovation in the AI era.

groups

Community First

Connect students, employers, and educators in a collaborative environment focused on real skills and honest conversations about AI.

psychology

Skills That Matter

Focus on practical skills, critical thinking, and adaptability rather than chasing trends or certifications that won't stand the test of time.

insights

Real Impact

Building the future of Newark through meaningful connections between talent, industry, and opportunity in the age of AI.

Core Values

Why Join Job Club?

The foundational principles that guide every decision and connection in our community.

01

Honest Conversations

We cut through the hype and doom to have real discussions about AI's impact on careers, education, and society. No BS, just evidence-based analysis.

02

Build Real Connections

Connect students with employers, mentors with mentees, and ideas with opportunities. Real relationships that create lasting impact beyond transactions.

03

Focus on Fundamentals

The skills that matter aren't changing as fast as the hype suggests. Critical thinking, communication, and adaptability never go out of style.

04

Newark's Future

Building the ecosystem that connects NJIT talent with industry opportunities right here in Newark. Making our city a hub for innovation and growth.
